tweet: Inspired by and proud of Landon for sharing his personal experience related to #Harvey. Congratulations on becoming a published author, Landon! #TX10 #Tomball https://abc13.com/society/11-year-old-publishes-book-about-hurricane-harvey-experience/5321774/ …

Following Memorial Day earlier this week, may we all continue to reflect on the sacrifice and service of those selfless patriots in our military who fight to ensure the many freedoms we enjoy today. #MilitaryAppreciationMonth pic.twitter.com/DyKzomwCYS

Honored to visit the new memorial in Austin for the 23 officers who paid the ultimate sacrifice in service to our community. May this tribute immortalize their legacy, courage, service, and sacrifice. #MemorialDay #TX10 pic.twitter.com/aZcVsHo5RE
It was an honor to be at the Bastrop #MemorialDay Ceremony to remember our fallen heroes. Freedom is never free. May we never forget their service and sacrifice! #TX10 pic.twitter.com/7XGSs21hdl

Today on the 151st #MemorialDay, we remember the brave men and women who courageously fought for our freedom & who bravely dedicated their lives in defense of our own. As you gather with family & friends today, I encourage you to reflect on the true meaning of Memorial Day. pic.twitter.com/nOw64s9oqR

We’ve done a good job defending the United States from terror attacks, we’ve done a very good job offensively killing the terrorists. 

The piece we haven’t done very well in my judgement is the PREVENTION piece, and that’s what the #GlobalFragilityAct is designed to do. https://twitter.com/ONEinAmerica/status/1130864074265419776 …

Spoke with @SandraSmithFox on @AmericaNewsroom ahead of today’s @HomelandGOP hearing with Acting @DHSgov Secretary @CBP_McAleenan. We need to come together and find a bipartisan solution to this massive migration problem. pic.twitter.com/Mk8il1QYC3

100 years ago today the 19th Amendment passed the House. Brave suffragettes marched, protested, & struggled so all the women who came after could vote. It is also why I signed on to the Smithsonian Women’s History Museum Act, to honor our nation’s female heroes.  #WomensVote100 pic.twitter.com/ig9I85axw8

Today's Rose Garden address by @POTUS highlighted the need we have for a #bordersecurity solution that also closes the legal loopholes of our broken #immigration system. My full statement ↓ pic.twitter.com/jFMQ42oflF

Today, I introduced the SAFE from Illicit Opioids Act. Addressing the #opioid epidemic requires a holistic approach, including a clear-cut #foreignpolicy strategy that goes beyond our borders & stops these dangerous drugs at the source. Full Statement ↓ http://bit.ly/2LPJp37

The Bipartisan Disaster Recovery Funding Act is a common-sense ask: Release the funding already appropriated; grant our communities the resources needed to rebuild and recover. #TX10 http://bit.ly/2LPyma7
Great to meet with @secnav76 today! We discussed worldwide #nationalsecurity threats and the latest on the evolving situation in the Middle East. pic.twitter.com/38Z2dTManp
Proud that my DHS Cyber Incident Response Teams Act of 2019 passed the @HomelandGOP committee today. You can learn more about my legislation here:  http://bit.ly/2W5AhLB  pic.twitter.com/qX9WiKzA0O

Proud to introduce the DHS Cyber Incident Response Teams Act of 2019 to help private & public sector orgs with cyberattack response & recovery. 

This coordinated effort will ensure our nation can continue to adapt to the constant changes in the cyber landscape. #cybersecurity https://twitter.com/HomelandGOP/status/1128687082220720128 …

TUNE IN: Speaking on my bill, H.R. 1158 the DHS Cyber Incident Response Teams Act of 2019, which authorizes #cyber incident response teams to help private and public sector organizations with cyber-attack response and recovery. #CyberSecurity https://twitter.com/HomelandGOP/status/1128662003780861952 …

Great visit at @IBM’s facility in Austin today! Enjoyed the chance to speak with constituents on improving #cybersecurity, protecting intellectual property, and using my post as the leader of @houseforeigngop to ensure America keeps its competitive edge against China. pic.twitter.com/5Jtlc75I1A

Happy Mother’s Day to all the wonderful mother’s in the 10th district. I’d like to give a special shot out to my beautiful wife, Linda, who is a dedicated and compassionate mother to our five children. pic.twitter.com/XSO8ZcAmMx

Great to catch up with Dr. Jim Allison, the 2018 Nobel Prize winner for his groundbreaking work on #immunotherapy. We have a shared passion to #endcancer and create hope.  Excited to see many more patients benefit from his work. pic.twitter.com/ymUOeEkDMH

I supported today’s disaster relief bill because it requires @HUDgov to expedite funding that has already been appropriated but not received by Texas after #HurricaneHarvey. I will always support legislation that prioritizes #TX10. My Full Statement ⇩ http://bit.ly/2LzDQpq

Extremely grateful to the French military for freeing 4 hostages, including an American citizen, who were held captive in Burkina Faso. I’m deeply saddened to hear that 2 brave soldiers lost their lives in this raid. Their courage and heroism will not be forgotten. https://twitter.com/AsstSecStateAF/status/1126868140275765248 …

Happy Military Spouse Appreciation Day! Today we honor our service members' spouses for their tremendous strength, sacrifice, and commitment to our nation. Thank you! #MilitarySpouseAppreciationDay pic.twitter.com/2Bdyn0L1pP

I join the @usembassyve in calling for Zambrano’s immediate release. Maduro’s security forces must cease from threatening the safety and security of the opposition and Interim President @jguaido. The international community is watching & will respond accordingly. https://twitter.com/usembassyve/status/1126297747848605698 …

Honored to meet with our local heroes at @TheRefugeDMST who are combating the evils of sex trafficking and serving our local community. They fill a great need by providing long-term, a residential, therapeutic community for survivors of #humantrafficking. pic.twitter.com/SdKYXJXq9D

Great meeting with @houstonpolice's Human Trafficking Rescue Alliance (HTRA) coming on the heels of the incredible success of Tri-Point, the 47-person arrest in Katy and Fort Bend County. I have long said a comprehensive approach is the only real solution to #endtrafficking. pic.twitter.com/zwvnUjQcsL

Congratulations to Mark Morgan, Former Head of Border Patrol, for being named the new head of @ICEGov. He's a true leader with extensive experience & I look forward to working with him.

I keep thinking of these beautiful families I met in Colombia last month. They were forced to flee #Venezuela to escape Maduro’s socialist regime. Their homes and people they love have been ravaged by destruction, violence and poverty. It could end if Maduro would step down. pic.twitter.com/YcC0mgwzcn
